description.original: Copy to clipboard, Open in default app, Show in system explorer, Reveal file in navigation, Open in new tab context menus for images.
description.translation: Copy to clipboard, Open in default app, Show in system explorer, Reveal file in navigation, Open in new tab context menus for images.

dict.Notice(\"Image copied to the clipboard!\: Notice("图片已复制并放入剪贴板",T.successNotice)
dict.Notice(\"Image was temporarily saved and: Notice("图像暂时保存，将在1分钟内删除")
dict..setName(\"Middle mouse click on image l: .setName("用鼠标中键单击图像链接以在新选项卡中打开")
dict..setName(\"Enable regular context menu o: .setName("在画布上启用常规上下文菜单")
dict..setDesc(\"You might want to disable thi: .setDesc("如果您使用插件替换默认的Obsidian文件导航，则可能需要禁用此功能。此插件支持文件树替代方案，如果已安装，则显示其显示菜单项。")
dict..setDesc(`The regular context menu somet: .setDesc(`常规上下文菜单有时会复制画布上的上下文菜单，因此默认情况下该菜单在画布上处于禁用状态。
dict.There is a separate context menu for ima: 对于画布上的图像，有一个单独的上下文菜单，但如果这还不够 (例如，对于画布上注释中的图像), 您也可以在这里启用常规上下文菜单。
